name: EXtreme Golf
description:
A fun challenging puzzle game with an action added twist. Navigate through multiple courses in a level, with different paths, so choose wisely. Levels are filled with obstacles such as teleporters, bounce pads and gates. Make use of the multiple endings and teleporters to complete the level in as least strokes as possible. Watch out for obstacles such as saws and explosive, which may set you back but can also lead to a strategic advantage.  

Instructions:

It's a simple golf game, just click your mouse on the ball, pull back and let go.  Try to finish the level in the least number of strokes.

Credits:

This game was my third game jam, for the "A Jam :0" game jam. 

Thanks to @7Teen for competing in the game jam with me

All sounds are from Kenny's assets or generated from sfxr

Font is '"pixel square" from Kenny's assets, the volume button and arrow buttons are also from Kenny.
